name: BREAKOUT 2080
description:
A remake of the original Breakout but with a 80s cyberpunk theme. Breakout 2080 features 3 levels along with power ups and different block types. Try to make it as far as you can. Still in development so a little bit buggy

Instructions

Use the left and right arrow keys to control the paddle.

Certain blocks are different from others and this can be seen through their colour

Every 3000 points you will gain a temporary power up.
